researchPapers.title: Predictive Models for Dengue Risk Mapping in Urban Dhaka
researchPapers.summary: A geospatial and machine-learning study on ward-level dengue risk forecasting for targeted prevention.

researchPapers.title: Solar-Assisted Low-Cost Water Purification for Semi-Urban Communities
researchPapers.summary: Prototype evaluation of an affordable purification unit integrating solar thermal pre-treatment.

researchPapers.title: First-Year Retention Drivers in Blended Undergraduate Learning
researchPapers.summary: Institutional evidence on advising, attendance, and LMS engagement impact on student retention.

journals.title: Aushnara Journal of Applied Sciences
journals.scope: Applied research in engineering, computing, environmental science, and public health.

journals.title: Journal of Business and Social Innovation
journals.scope: Research on entrepreneurship, policy, social impact, and regional development.

activities.title: Inter-College Robotics Challenge 2026
activities.summary: Teams from 20 partner colleges compete in autonomous navigation and rescue simulation tasks.

activities.title: Career Readiness Week: Industry Mentorship Series
activities.summary: Employer panels, CV clinics, mock interviews, and internship matching sessions for final-year students.

activities.title: Community Health Screening Outreach
activities.summary: Faculty-supervised student volunteers provide screening and awareness support for local residents.
